Title: SilveR - Online Statistics Application
Description: SilveR is a Silverlight based online statistical analysis application written in c# with a WCF backend exposing an R service
HomeWiki:
Project Description
ƩilveR is a powerful, free to use, statistical software package which uses a Microsoft Silverlight GUI and R as its statistics engine. The package combines complex and powerful statistical tools (within R) with a user interface that is both easy to use and intuitive to the non-statistician. While no package can comment on the suitability of a statistical analysis, ƩilveR has many dataset checks so errors within the data, that may invalidate the results of the analysis, are identified prior to analysis.

Working Online Version

Please see the website http://silverstats.co.uk for a working version of this project
